workHistory.title: UI/UX Designer (Design System)
description: Enhanced and documented existing design systems of Astra Insurance.
Improved consistency and usability across platforms.
Created comprehensive guidelines and resources for team-wide reference.

workHistory.title: AI Researcher
workHistory.company: Smart City and Cyber Security Laboratory (KCKS)
description: Researching real-time style transfer techniques to apply artistic styles to real-life images using smaller model sizes than existing models.
Working on a research paper detailing the developed model and its applications.
Created a Mean Opinion Score (MOS) website for research purposes on image evaluation.

workHistory.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Worked on the migration of ERP ITS from a legacy truncated version to an updated iteration utilizing the Next.js framework.
Developed and applied specific logic, while ensuring seamless transition of existing features to the updated platform.
Built UI refinement and CSS styling for the enhanced iteration of ERP ITS.
Acquired proficiency in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles through React.js implementation.
Collaborated with the established backend infrastructure to effectively deploy new functionalities.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with focus on web development and design.
Participated in various events, hackathons, and projects.

education.institution: Bangkit Academy led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, & Traveloka
description: TensorFlow Mastery: Built and applied Neural Networks for image (CNNs), text (NLP), and even poetry generation.
End-to-End ML & Advanced DL: Diagnosed ML errors, implemented end-to-end, transfer, and multi-task learning, and utilized advanced techniques like Functional API and distributed training.
Generative AI & Certification: Understand Generative AI concepts including LLMs and responsible AI, and are prepared for the TensorFlow Developer Certificate Exam.
